title: US Dahua 8CH 4K 8MP IP Smart Ai Security ip Camera Systems full color IR Mic lot
itemDescription:
4K 8MP Smart Dual Light Active Deterrence Fixed-focal Eyeball WizSense Network Camera system
IPC-HDW3849H-AS-PV
4K 8MP Smart Dual Light Active Deterrence Fixed-focal Eyeball WizSense Network Camera
 > 8-MP 1/2.8" CMOS image sensor, low luminance, and high definition image.
> Outputs max. 8 MP (3840 × 2160)-25/30 fps.
> H.265 codec, high compression rate, ultra-low bit rate.
> Built-in warm light and IR LED; the max. IR illumination distance is 30 m and warm light distance is 30 m.
> ROI, SMART H.264+/H.265+, AI H.264/H.265, flexible coding, applicable to various bandwidth and storage environments.
> Rotation mode, WDR, 3D NR, HLC, BLC, digital watermarking, applicable to various monitoring scenes.
> Intelligent monitoring: Intrusion, tripwire (the two function support the classification and accurate detection of vehicle and human).
> Abnormality detection: Motion detection, privacy masking, scene changing, audio detection, no SD card, SD card full, SD card error, network disconnection, IP conflict, illegal access, and voltage detection.
> Alarm: 1 in, 1 out; audio: 1 in, 1 out; supports max. 256 G Micro SD card; built-in dual Mic; built-in speaker; 1-ch speaker; support two-way talk
> 12 VDC/PoE power supply.
> IP67 protection.
> Sound and light alarm (red and blue lights).
> SMD 4.0.
> One-tap arming/disarming through alarm input.
NVR2108HS-8P-I2
8 Channel Compact 1U 8PoE 1HDD WizSense Network Video Recorder
> Smart H.265+/H.265/Smart H.264+/H.264/MJPEG decoding format
> Max. decoding capability: 6 × 1080p-30 fps. Supports adaptive decoding
> 1-channel face detection and recognition (AI by NVR); 1-channel perimeter protection (AI by NVR); up to 10 face databases and 5,000 face images; 4-channel SMD Plus (AI by NVR);
> AI by camera: Face detection and recognition, perimeter protection, and SMD Plus
> Connected to the third-party network cameras
> Security baseline 2.1
With advanced deep learning algorithm, Dahua WizSense 3 Series network camera supports intelligent functions, such as perimeter protection and smart motion detection. With starlight technology, this series camera provides a better image effect in the condition of low illuminance.
Play&Play
Original Dahua Security Home CCTV System
 Functions
 Siren and Light Active Deterrence
Dahua siren and light active deterrence network camera supports thelight alarm and voice alarm when perimeter event occurs, to realize thedeterrence and effective intervention. The camera is built in multiplevoices for selection, and supports customized voice importing.
 SMD 4.0
Dahua Smart Motion Detection technology works with intelligentalgorithms to classify targets that trigger motion detection alarms. Itfilters out objects that are not targets, such as small and large animals,to avoid triggering false alarms. With an AI NVR, Quick Pick technologybecomes available, allowing you to easily search for and pick out humanand vehicle targets from SMD event videos, prioritizing the highestmatches. 
 Smart Dual Light
Dahua Smart Dual Light technology adopts smart algorithm to detecttargets. Usually, the IR illuminator is on at night; when the targetappears in the monitoring area, the white light is on, and the camerarecords the full-color video and information of key events. That is, thecamera links snapshot and video with full-color image. When the targetis out of the monitoring area, the white light is off and the IR illuminatoris on, which reduces light pollution efficiently.
  Perimeter Protection
With deep learning algorithm, Dahua Perimeter Protection technologycan recognize human and vehicle accurately. In restricted area (suchas pedestrian area and vehicle area), the false alarms of intelligentdetection based on target type (such as tripwire, intrusion) are largelyreduced. 
 Full-color
With high-performance sensor and large aperture lens, Dahua Full-colortechnology can display clear colorful image in the environment of ultralow illuminance. With this photosensitivity technology, the camera cancapture more available light, and display more colorful image details
 Smart H.265+ & Smart H.264+
With advanced scene-adaptive rate control algorithm, Dahua smartencoding technology realizes the higher encoding efficiency than H.265and H.264, provides high-quality video, and reduces the cost of storageand transmission
 Cyber Security
Dahua network cameras employ a series of security technologies,including security authentication and authorization, access controlprotocols, trusted protection, encrypted transmission and encryptedstorage. These technologies improve the camera's defense againstexternal cyber threats and prevent malicious programs fromcompromising the device.
 Protection (IP67, Wide Voltage)
IP67: The camera passes a series of strict test on dust and soak. It has dust-proof function, and the enclosure can work normally after soakingin 1 m deep water for 30 minutes.Wide voltage: The camera allows ±30% (for some power supplies)input voltage tolerance (wide voltage range), and it is widely applied tooutdoor environment with instable voltage.
  Easy for using
About Us:
1. Cameras and NVR are 100% Original Dahua, with Dahua Logo, support Upgrade firmware.
2. We Support batch order. If you want more and save more, pls contact us to get a better price.
4. Installers and traders welcome to contact with us Price List!
5. We are Top agent, and with more 10 years security system experience
6. This item is provided with 3 years warranty, and All-life technical Support.  if there is any problem after purchased, please feel free to contact us for help.
 System Tools： 
> APP : iDmss( iOS), gDmss( Android),
> PC client : Smartpass lite
> Search Tool：Config Tool （search device and change IP address if needed）
> Default IP：192.168.1.108
> Camera lens: 2.8mm
 Kindly Remind :
4CH=4channel, means that NVR can max can add 4pcs cameras to NVR(Network video recorder)
8CH=8channel, means that NVR can max can add 8pcs cameras to NVR(Network video recorder) 
16CH=16channel, means that NVR can max can add 16pcs cameras to NVR(Network video recorder) 
32CH=32channel, means that NVR can max can add 32pcs cameras to NVR(Network video recorder)

   Q&A
 Q: Can I use WiFi for this camera ?
A:  No, This is wired camera, should connect wired internet cable, it is not a wifi camera.
 Q : What is POE camera?
A:  Means that camera can power by POE switch or POE NVR, internet cables can supplier power to camera, no need connect extra power adapter. Please note, camera without power adapter in it, so we sugget you use POE switch or extra power adapter if needed
 Q: What is APP for this camera?
A:  APP is DMSS, support IOS or andriod. for PC client software is Smartpss
 Q: Can I update firmware for this camera?
A:  Yes , you can update firmware yourself, this is original dahua camera, support update firmware.
 Q: This camera is in english version？
A:  Yes, camera in english version

title: ANNKE 12MP 8CH 16CH NVR 4K PoE Color Security Camera System Audio Record Outdoor
itemDescription:
ANNKE H800
16CH 12MP NVR Color Night PoE Bullet Security Camera System
All-Purpose 4K Surveillance Around the Clock
Best 4K Def. in 16:9 Image Scale
The 1/2.4" progressive scan BSI CMOS image sensor delivers 4K resolution (3840*2160), not only bringing clearer image quality with finer details but a 16:9 image scale that is perfectly matched with the screen without distortion.
Accurate Human & Vehicle Detection
Motion Detection 2.0 recognizes and extracts key objects quickly like human beings and vehicles, reducing up to 99% of false alarms.
Hi-Fi Audio Recording
Level up the security by recording videos with voice information. The built-in noise-cancelling microphone enables high-fidelity audio recording by filtering out external sounds for immersive listening. Audio record enhances security coverage and helps interpret events.
From Black & White to Colored Night
With the default IR night vision, human&vehicle triggered and turned the vision into color. Remains color night vision even in dark environments, turns to B&W when less than 0.005Lux. Also supports IR night vision and color night vision mode switching. (66ft color night vision and 100ft IR night vision)
TF Card & NVR Storage
Record videos onto the NVR (an HDD is needed for video record, built-in 2 SATA interfaces, support up to 2 8TB HDD for maximum 16 TB capacity) or onto a TF card up to 512 GB (not included) for local video storage without paying monthly cloud storage fees.
SD Card: Supported UP to 512GB Micro SD Card (Not Included)
HDD: Supported UP to 8TB Hard Disk Drives (HDD Not Included)
Real-Time App Pushes & Email Alerts
When the system detects any difference, it will push instant app notifications and email alerts to you, so that you can access the system to check the motion events and take actions to prevent possible intrusion.
Email: Email alert with on-scene snapshots.
APP: Instant push notifications right on your mobile device.
Unlimited Smart Search&Playback
24/7 non-stop recording and auto-overwritten recording are default, or motion detection recording and schedule recording are up to you to choose.
For the playback, instant playback, ordinary playback or event smart playback are supported. And extra user-friendly functions like private recording setting, lost video finding and 4 CH line crossing detection are all ready for you. Locate vital videos in countable seconds.
Customized Motion Areas & Privacy Mask
You can always customize motion detection with specific motion zones, like doorsteps, garages. You will receive instant alerts only when motion events happen in the customized areas. To protect your privacy, you may set up the privacy mask. The system will ignore the masked zones when recording videos.
Outdoor IP67 Weatherproof
Rated as IP67 weatherproof, the camera continues to function even being immersed in 1 m of water for 30 minutes. It has been tested in the most frigid conditions, ensuring seamless performance in torrential downpours, freezing/broiling temperatures (-22 °F – 140 °F).
120 dB True WDR & 3D DNR
The 120 dB true WDR automatically adjusts the brightest & darkest points of the videos, resulting in optimized & highly-detailed footages in the high-contrast lighting conditions. 3D DNR filters out digital noise to provide a cleaner and more accurate image in low-light scenes.
Industry-Leading H.265+ Video Format
Keep the exceptional 4K Ultra HD footages without the 4K file sizes thanks to the ANNKE's exclusive leading H.265+ video format. It recordes longer videos, a 80% increase in storage than H.264 coding, and provides smooth 4K stream without using all the data.
24/7 Recording Even Without Internet
This PoE security camera system can provide 24/7 non-stop video recording even without Internet access. For remote access via smartphones, tablets or computers and motion alerts, Internet connection is required.
NVR

title: New Rear View Backup Parking Camera Fit For 2015-2017 Honda Accord 39530-T2A-A31
itemDescription:
Rear View Backup Parking Camera Fit For 2015-2017 Honda Accord OEM39530-T2A-A31
Product Features:
 *High-Definition-Camera
Clear shooting day and night. With a far-infrared wide-angle camera device, obstacles can be seen behind the car. The rear view backup camera makes the situation behind the car more intuitive when reversing, allowing you to reverse easily and safely and provide a great visual effect experience.
 *Built to Last
Crafted with durability in mind, this camera is built to withstand various weather conditions, ensuring longevity and reliable performance.
 *Plug and Play
Plugs into Existing OEM Video Harness, clear resolution, easy to install, direct replacement for your old or broken parking assistant camera.
 *Perfect Fit
Designed specifically for the 2015-2017 Honda Accord, this camera seamlessly integrates into your car's rear view system, ensuring a factory-like installation.
 *Enhanced Parking Assistance
Say goodbye to blind spots and parking anxiety as this camera offers optimal guidance, making every parking maneuver a breeze.
 Product Specifications:
 Color: Black
Material: ABS
Field of View Angle: 170°
Waterproof Rating: IP69
Number of Pins: 8 Pins
Installation Position: Rear
Resolution: 1080p
Voltage: 12V
Replace OE# 39530-T2A-A31
Suitable for Honda Accord 2.4L 3.5L Accord 2015-2017 models
 Package Include:
 1 x Rear View Backup Camera
